name: Town Tractor Farming Simulator
description:
Become a modern farmer with Town Tractor Farming Simulator. Immerse yourself in a huge open world and harvest crops, take care of your livestock - cows, sheep, and pigs - take part in forestry, and sell your products in an open market to earn money and upgrade your farm. A real farmer life story based on day-to-day farmer duty.
Take charge of your modern form and start from setting up for crops to harvest and sell in market. Growing up and taking care of livestock is your foremost duty being a farmer. Farming is easy and modern with machinery. Drive and operate special farming vehicles and machines to become a real farmer.

Hurry up look for your crops before the sunset. Care your crops by using effective fertilizers and pesticides. Increase your production by learning and practicing new farming concepts. Town Tractor Farming Simulator is a perfect farming duty based game simulator where you have to perform each and every task within time. Drive tractors, combines, plows, harvesters, seeders, trollies and spray machines in your from.
Start from cultivating and plough the land, once you have prepared the land sow the seeds. Now it’s time to water fields to grow crops. Looking after these crops is most important. Crops are ready to harvest, ride your combine harvester machine, drive it to wheat fields and harvest it.
Collect your grains with your purpose made storage area. Transport your wheat to market for selling. Maybe loose or less fine wheat can’t sell in good price. Make your wheat pure and fine with safe packing to get better market price.

Features

Realistic Vehicles and Machineries
Grow different crops
Grow animals and manage them
Prepare new fields
Play in career mode
Sell crops for money
USA and European Farming
Auto driving feature
Day-Hours working
Steering Wheel & realistic controls
